text: Hey! I have done a module in the design manager and then fetch it in to my local code. Now i wanted to do some changes in my module through the design manager, i published changes, but nothing happend in my local code. So how do i implement the changes of my module thats already in my local code?

• My client has a blog with many existing entries
• They want to create a post that somewhat deviates from the basic text + images. In this case, it’ll contain a component that contains some statistics
• This component should be placed midway through the blog post on the right side. There is paragraph text from the blog post on the left.
• I know I can build this block with a custom HubSpot module, but what I’m struggling with is understanding how I can place it within the “document flow” of the standard *Blog Content* (as opposed to just appending the module _after_ the *Blog Content* block)
• Is it possible to place Modules within *Blog Content*? I see the editor’s *Insert* button includes some blocks I can insert (Call to Action, Table, Video). How do these differ from modules? Can I create my own one of these that can be inserted within the *Blog Content*?
